xxl.core.spatial.geometries
Interface LineString2D

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Geometry2D>, Curve2D, Geometry2D, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Line2D, LinearRing2D
public interface LineString2D
extends Curve2D

A LineString is a Curve with linear interpolation between points. Each consecutive pair of points defines a line segment.

Method Summary
 int getNumberOfPoints()
          Returns the number of points in this LineString.
 Point2D getPoint(int n)
          Returns the n-th point in this LineString.
